tool_description: This API provides on a monthly basis, the amount of methane in the atmosphere from 1983 to the present. Expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).
title: Atmosphere methane concentration

api_list.name: Methane endpoint
api_list.description: The response will be an object with no CORS resources enabled.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://atmosphere-methane-concentration.p.rapidapi.com/api/methane-api"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "atmosphere-methane-concentration.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
